title: Ticket #2981: If NAMED_CHROOT invalid startd fails to run anything
description:
If NAMED_CHROOT is present in the config but points to a location which is either invalid or does not have sufficient privs all jobs will fail to run even though the resource was not requested.

To fix, only fail if the resource is requested in the job ad.
